value.text: Fire Nation; specifically Jang Hui River
value.value_text: Fire Nation; specifically Jang Hui River

paragraphs.body: The clam is an ${link_0} found in the ${link_1}, more specifically the ${link_2}. It was consumed regularly by the residents of ${link_3}.
paragraphs.text: The clam is an animal found in the Fire Nation, more specifically the Jang Hui River. It was consumed regularly by the residents of Jang Hui.

paragraphs.body: In the latter stages of the ${link_0}, a ${link_1} near Jang Hui began polluting the surrounding river with its sludge waste. This resulted in vast ecological damage to the surrounding area, including the clams.
paragraphs.text: In the latter stages of the Hundred Year War, a Fire Nation Army factory near Jang Hui began polluting the surrounding river with its sludge waste. This resulted in vast ecological damage to the surrounding area, including the clams.

paragraphs.body: Despite these changes, ${link_0} still continued to sell these clams along with other mutated wildlife. A few of these creatures were presented to ${link_1}, who neglected buying them out of disgust.
paragraphs.text: Despite these changes, Xu still continued to sell these clams along with other mutated wildlife. A few of these creatures were presented to Team Avatar, who neglected buying them out of disgust.

paragraphs.body: Taken from the bottom of the filthy river bed, the clam is filled with a multitude of disgusting substances including dirt, ${link_0}, and dead bugs. It is a bivalved mollusk that is somewhat brown in color and has what appear to be blisters on its shells.
paragraphs.text: Taken from the bottom of the filthy river bed, the clam is filled with a multitude of disgusting substances including dirt, seaweed, and dead bugs. It is a bivalved mollusk that is somewhat brown in color and has what appear to be blisters on its shells.

paragraphs.body: The clam is a mollusk, an invertebrate animal whose body is protected by two symmetrical shells. It has no brain or eyes, but has a set of kidneys, a heart, a mouth, and an anus. It feeds on plankton, and its natural predators are small sharks and squid.
paragraphs.text: The clam is a mollusk, an invertebrate animal whose body is protected by two symmetrical shells. It has no brain or eyes, but has a set of kidneys, a heart, a mouth, and an anus. It feeds on plankton, and its natural predators are small sharks and squid.
